channel.title: Ip/port
channel.description: hi all i just make my own server and every thing seems fine but when i run my client it says "error js5connect", other ppl told me you must change your ip, so can you help me how to change my ip/port?

item.title: Ip/port
item.dc:creator: @noor359 noor359
item.description:
@noor359 wrote:

[quote=“Seanloh08, post:2, topic:449153”]Of your server or your pc? if Server then go into your client and search Client.java open and search 127.0.0.1 change to your ip.Then go to your source and search server.java then once again search 127.0.0.1 and change to your ip. For your Pc i have no clue :([/quote]i can’t find both of them, i am using 636 client

Read full topic
